Detailed Description

This module contains classes for dealing with entities.

This module contains classes that implement entity definitions, entity data types, and entity methods.

An entity is an object in the game that is maintained by the BigWorld server. It has properties and methods associated with it, which can be accessed across a network connection. The definitions of all supported entity types are stored in a file called entities.xml. The classes in this module parse the entities.xml file, and extract property and method definitions. These definitions are used by the client, the server, and the editor.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum EntityDataFlags

This enumeration is used for flags to indicate properties of data associated with an entity type.

Enumerator:
DATA_GHOSTED  Synchronised to ghost entities.
DATA_OTHER_CLIENT  Sent to other clients.
DATA_OWN_CLIENT  Sent to own client.
DATA_BASE  Sent to the base.
DATA_CLIENT_ONLY  Static client-side data only.
DATA_PERSISTENT  Saved to the database.
DATA_EDITOR_ONLY  Only read and written by editor.
DATA_ID  Is an indexed column in the database.

Function Documentation

DataTypePtr DataType::buildDataType ( DataSectionPtr  pSection  )  [static, inherited]

This factory method returns the DataType derived object associated with the input data section.

Parameters:
pSection The data section describing the data type.
Returns:
A pointer to the data type. NULL if an invalid id is entered.
